title: [Self-directed] e-Learning Gamification Strategy Design: Enhancing Participation in Elementary Education Communities

context.prior_knowledge: Experience in Elementary Education Curriculum Operations, Basic E-Learning Platform Proficiency, and Understanding of Gamification Concepts
context.additional_context: A process for in-service elementary teachers and education professionals to design and implement gamification strategies aimed at increasing e-learning engagement among school community members (students, teachers, parents, etc.).

learning_goals: Learners can design at least three engagement strategies using gamification elements in e-learning environments.
Learners can develop gamification scenarios reflecting roles of various school community members in simulation/VR environments.
Learners can quantitatively analyze the effects of gamification application through project-based assessments.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
